name: Ultra Tic Tac Toe
short_description: Ultra Tic Tac Toe is a console board game package that includes tic tac toe and two other games.  UTTT contains a highly optimized computer AI engine, which supports PThreads.  This page also has Solaris gaim binaries (until I create a project for them).
